## type [Mailer](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/adapters/outbound/mailer/logger/logger.go#L12-L14>)

Mailer logs outbound emails for debugging or local development It is suitable for sandbox environments where external providers are unavailable

```go
type Mailer struct {
    Logger *zap.Logger
}
```
